column1: Your Steam account password has been successfully changed. We are sending this notice to ensure the privacy and security of your Steam account. If you authorized this change
column2: no further action is necessary. If you did not authorize this change
column3: then please change your Steam password
column4: and consider changing your email password as well to ensure your account security. If you are unable to access your account
column5: then you may use this account specific recovery link for assistance recovering or self-locking your account.
